name: ng2-material-dynamic-form
description: Dynamic form module using material design for angular 2

scripts.compile: if [ -e ./dist ]; then rm -rf dist && node_modules/.bin/ngc -p tsconfig.json && cp package.json README.md ./dist; else node_modules/.bin/ngc -p tsconfig.json && cp package.json README.md ./dist; fi
